ccc_price_permission.terms: -- FOR DEMONSTRATION AND TESTING ONLY -- This application is currently directed at the Copyright Clearance Center's testing and demonstration server. No rights are actually being granted or orders generated by this software. -- Caution about "Only Globe Staff and Globe Correspondent materials may be used": Verification of authorship is your responsibility. Please check the author of the article before using this material. Contact the Globe directly for permission for articles authored by "Globe Correspondents", for photo use, or for editorials and articles by Ellen Goodman, David Shribman, and Dan Wasserman - 617-929-2659.
